sentences.en: A wren is a kind of short - winged songbird.
sentences.cn: 鹪鹩是一种短翼的鸣禽.

sentences.en: American songbird; male is black and orange or yellow.
sentences.cn: 美洲歌鸟; 其雄鸟为黑色和桔黄色或黄色.

sentences.en: Barbara has turned into a talented songbird.
sentences.cn: 芭芭拉成了一名才华横溢的女歌手.

sentences.en: European songbird noted for its melodious nocturnal song.
sentences.cn: 以夜晚发出悦耳动听的鸣声而闻名的欧洲歌鸟.

sentences.en: European songbird with a reddish breast and tail; related to Old World robins.
sentences.cn: 胸部和尾部羽毛略带红色的欧亚大陆歌鸟; 与东半球的知更鸟近缘.

sentences.en: Martinez sees the power of nature every day, from teaching neighbors to start gardens and songbird areas to leading inner-city kids on wilderness adventures.
sentences.cn: 马丁内斯每天都在见证自然的力量，从教导邻居开始开辟花园和鸣鸟区，到带领城市里的孩子们去野外大冒险。

sentences.en: North American songbird whose call resembles a cat's mewing.
sentences.cn: 北美洲鸣鸟,其叫声象猫.

sentences.en: Songbird Ca + Na + Ry Increases speed. Adds lightning damage.
sentences.cn: 光明闪耀增加速度和光明系魔法伤害.

sentences.en: That little girl sings well. She must be a songbird in the future.
sentences.cn: 那个小女孩歌唱得很好. 她将来一定能成为一名歌唱家.

sentences.en: The American Robin ( Turdus migratorius ) a migratory songbird of the thrush family.
sentences.cn: 美洲知更鸟 ( 旅鸫 ) 是画眉科迁徙鸣鸟.

sentences.en: The linnet is a small brown songbird.
sentences.cn: 红雀是一种棕色会叫的小鸟.

sentences.en: The songbird watched from the branch.
The zebra finch is a tiny Australian songbird.
sentences.cn: 斑胸草雀是一种来自澳洲的小型鸣禽。

sentences.en: Your voice resounds like a songbird's, every word is a sweet, soft song.
sentences.cn: 你的声音好像鸟雀的欢唱, 每个词句像一首甜蜜 、 温柔的歌.

words.tran_cn: 鸣禽，鸣鸟；女歌手；告密者

trans.tran_cn: 鸣禽，鸣鸟，女歌手，<俚>告密者
trans.tran_en: a bird that can make musical sounds
